QuestionText: What is the primary function of the pancreas in the human body?
OptionA: To filter waste and excess fluids from the blood
OptionB: To produce hormones that regulate blood sugar levels
OptionC: To store and concentrate bile produced by the liver
OptionD: To break down proteins into smaller peptides
